data.message: Eminem hasn't been relevant for a decade. Guess he has to do something to get attention.  Funny how rappers 'Freestyle' like they haven't written down and memorized that shit already. It's pathetic.

replies.message: Except that's what almost everyone does since the early 80's.  It isn't a new phenomenon.  They all write down bars in their downtime and practice using them so they can throw them out smoothly when the time comes.

he will ride that anti Trump train, plenty of fools to follow him. If they only spent their energy helping instead of bitchin, they all should work on fixing the shit hole inner citites they came from.....
EXACTLY
This decade

Eminem could still beat a majority of people in a freestyle at the drop of a hat...you underestimate his skill because you don't like what he says. And he hasn't been mainstream "relevant" by his choice...not because he faded out
Except that he is the artist of the decade (2000-2010) and just won a grammy for his last album so yeah you're an idiot
They're just saying that shit cuz he's not on their weak sided views
Youre a fucking moron stick to fishing dumbass

Funny how everybody talks shit,
When he's the balls that you lick
And still comment on it.
Definition of pathetic 
Spits a real verse and you still get it
Use it like it's your thought, he must be a mental prosthetic 
But you'd rather bitch about that fact that he said it
You're opinion is  worse than the Kardashians credit
Of course its written. Its not only called a freestyle when you going off the top of the head. A freestyle is also just a verse that isnt a complete song.
How lost are you??? Not relevant in a decade wow go find that rock and go back under
He is telling the truth.trump is always attacking others.bullying
It's a true freestyle, just cause certain thoughts are rolling around his head doesn't mean it's a written verse. I take it none of you can freestyle
You sir are a moron. He is considered by all his peers as the greatest. Relevant, dude look in the mirror!
Jealous much? What have you done with your life??
Still got you to come to him paying homage like he's a threat.
22 million like Dump on Facebook. 90 million like Eminem. I would say he's relevant, lol. 😂
Yeah but you were NEVER relevant... even that woman you with is for 100% getting a side piece... shit man you ever exist?
Dude his last album went 4xs platinum.... that was only 4 years ago. But he's  not relevant??
Says the guy who's NEVER been "relevant"..
Wow look at all the Eminem blow up doll owners getting offended. If Eminem sold  that many albums, he must take EBT.
Is it really even music when you cant understand a thing they say and all the beats are computer generated. Give them an instrument and they would be lost....
Exactly
